attributes.title: HATE THIS APP💞😡🧚‍♂️
attributes.review:
I down loaded this app to support my lovely,orange,bald head president💖but i when i opened the app i was encountered with a box to put my phone number.I believe he did this to kidnap us and keep us in the basement this D I S G U S T me in every shape or form 😡😡.Also when i opened the app i passed out i was dead but no really.I woke up on my bed and when i woke up i had a call from the government saying that the president wanted to talk to me🤢💫.He said i needed to vote for him i screamed at him and told him that i would never ever because he made me pass out.I think this is anABUSE of power.He should not be able to make apps because of his pasts relationship (we all know he is a creep💖🧚🏻)He should also not be able to get our information because i don’t want to get kidnapped or anyone else too.
  
PLEASE GET THIS APP TO HOP OFF THE APP STORE CAUSE I DONT WANT TO PASS OUT OR GET KIDNAPPED 💖😋

attributes.title: Honest Review!!!!
attributes.review: At first glance, this app may seem like the average campaign app but further inspection reveals that the app has horrible programming, incorrect information, and unsustainable software. If I could give this app no stars I would. My brother’s sister’s friend’s dog walker’s nephew’s girlfriend’s aunt’s daughter is Best Buy employee so I think I would know bad programming when I see it. Furthermore, this app advertises a man that like to use fear and intimidation to accommodate for his absolute incompetence. So there’s that. Have a great day to everybody except those who still support a racist, xenophobic, sexist pig!!!

attributes.title: It’s a no for me.
attributes.review: In honor of the recent and untimely passing of the president, I decided to download this app this app to honor him. Only to find his ghost and people telling me he’s not dead.💀 🤦🏾‍♀️I- he’s dead asl, in his casket. Chile anyway’s r.i.p,and they said his besfran was too! Mike Pence surrounded by a fence 6 feet under there he lies, no more secret spies. Whew won’t God do it! Idk if I’ll see him on the other side, I’m praying for heaven soooooo I guess not. Hopefully he’ll blend in with the orange reddish colors down there!! Wonder if he has Cheetos to eat? RIP(aka hell) TRUMP 2020 GRAVESTONE 🧡🧡🧚‍♀️ That’s it. Follow me on tic tac 247misscarmendavis247

attributes.title: Worst app ever 😭
attributes.review: THIS APP IS A NIGHTMARE ALL TOGETHER. First off as soon as I opened the app this huge scary monster appeared on my screen. After seeing that I have severe depression, sadly my cat saw it with me and started throwing knives then ended it. Rip ms.whiskers😫😔. And on top of that trump grabbed my brother and spiked him like a football! I do not recommend this app. It gives you false accusations and worst English pronunciations I’ve ever heard. I now hate oranges and wigs because of this scary man child. Sent the link to my friend and now I’m attending his funeral. You will always be missed casper😭😭. I blame this so called trump for these deaths and trying to keep all thirty of my animals from killing themselves after seeing this. God has a purpose for everyone🧚🏼‍♀️✨🙈except trump🤩🥰😍. His mom truly should’ve aborted him and behalf of America we don’t claim him as one of us.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET 😔🕳👩‍🦯
